content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "What is your name?"
[Answer] "My name is Emilia Müller."


[Question] "Who did you have the conversation with?"
[Answer] "I had this conversation with Mister Peter Schmidt."


[Question] "What was the main topic of the conversation?"
[Answer] "The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg."


[Question] "Did you agree on a final price?"
[Answer] "No"
name: Emilia Müller

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "Did you not agree on a final price?"
[Answer] "No, we did not agree on a final price because the landlord, Mister Schmidt, was looking for a higher price than I was willing to pay. I, as a student, was looking for an affordable place and was willing to pay a monthly rent of €700, but Mister Schmidt was looking for a higher price."
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?"
[Answer] "I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mister Schmidt, as an 8."
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "At any point of the negotiation, did you feel discriminated or offended?"
[Answer] "No, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation."
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] "If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?"
[Answer] "However, the response is 'No', so there is no need for an answer to this question."
name: Emilia Müller
